Name: The SOL Device 2
About the game: After escaping the research ship, Samuel finds himself crash landed on a foreign planet overrun by a hostile organization. Now it's up to Samuel and his trusty SOL equipment to rescue the scientists who also escaped the ship, and find a way off of the planet. Platform your way through a 2D environment Unlock new abilities to solve puzzles in new ways Fight enemies or sneak past them Collect materials to purchase upgrades to customize your abilities
